job.title: Electromechanical Assembler
job.description: Assemble world class production systems Support the engineers designing the systems Work experience in a similar position Good technical acumen and ability to read drawings Communication skills in Estonian and English Estonian work permit Good computer skills, experience using ERP/CAD software Ability to use hand and power tools Self-discipline and orientation to teamwork You can accelerate your career and enjoy professional growth opportunities You will get employer health insurance and sports compensation We organize regular team events and company Summer Days that foster camaraderie, collaboration, and fun outside of the workplace
